content.question: The author’s statement in the first paragraph concerning Spain’s relationship with its colonies in the Americas is most likely influenced by which of the following late-eighteenth-century developments?

choices.label: The emergence of new economic ideas challenging mercantilist theory and practice
The outbreak of armed rebellions in Spanish colonies calling for national independence
The formulation of new models of political representation based on the idea of the social contract
The growing productivity of Spain’s domestic economy as a result of the Industrial Revolution

content.answer: The emergence of new economic ideas challenging mercantilist theory and practice

topic.text: 4.1: Contextualizing the Scientific Revolution and Enlightenment
